raw_body: GUNAWARDENA – Mr. M.W.R.D.P. RANJITH. We announce with deep regret the demise of Mr. M.W.R.D.P. Ranjith Gunawardena,​ (Past Deputy Mayor of Hatton-Dickoya Urban Council,​ retired Head Master of Hatton Post Office,​ Past President of Lions Club,​ Hatton,​ Past Chairman of Hatton Young Buddhist Society). Beloved husband of Sujatha Gunawardena,​ loving father of Jayesha Fernando and Maneka Edirisinghe,​ father-in-law of Sarith Fernando and Niroshan Edirisinghe and grandfather of Elysha Edirisinghe. Remains lie at the “B” Hall,​ Jayarathna Funeral Parlour,​ Borella from 8.30 a.m. onwards on the 17th of April 2024 and cremation will take place on the same day at 4.00 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Borella.            025372
